覢字的基本解释

覢
shǎn
忽然出现。

覢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shǎn］
［《廣韻》失冉切，上琰，書。］
(1)同“睒”。忽然出现。
(2)闪电。因其乍见乍灭，故称。

覢字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　覢； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1135第27
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?失冉切，音閃。【說文】暫見也。引【春秋·公羊傳】覢然公子陽生。今本作闖，註闖出頭貌。　又【倉頡篇】覢覢，視貌。　【韻會】與睒同。

考證：〔【說文】暫見也。【公羊傳·哀六年】覢然公子陽生。〕　謹按作覢者說文所引之本無哀六年三字。謹照說文原文改爲引春秋公羊傳覢然公子陽生。〔覢然公子陽生。【註】出頭貌。今本作闖然。〕　謹按作覢者訓爲暫見。作闖者訓爲出頭貌。不得合以爲一。註字以下謹改爲今本作闖，註闖出頭貌。
覢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
覢字的起名意思

暂无。

覢
Basic explanation of words
覢
shǎn
Suddenly appeared.
覢
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shǎn］
["Guangyun" lost and cut, Shangyan, book. ]
(1) Same as "睒". Suddenly appeared.
(2) Lightning. Because it sees and disappears at first sight, it is called.

[You Ji 1] [See the Department of Words] 　覢; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1135 Page 27
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Lost and cut, the sound flashes. [Said the text] See you for now. Quote [Chun Qiu · Gong Yang Biography] You Ran Young Master Yang Sheng. This book is for Chuang, note Chuang's prominence.　[Cangjie Chapter] 覢覢, look.　【Rhyme Meeting】Same as Sui. Textual research: [[Said Wen] See you temporarily. [The Story of Gongyang·Sixth Year of Amour] The son of You Ran Yang was born. 〕 　 I would like to follow the three characters of the original six years without sorrow in the text quoted by the author. I would like to say that the original text is changed to quote Chunqiu Gongyang Chuan Yinran Young Master Yangsheng. 〔Yu Ran Young Master Yang Sheng. [Note] Get out of the picture. Today this is a Chuang Ran. 〕 　 I would like to see you as a temporary visitor. Trained as an intruder to be prosperous. Must not be one. Following the note, I would like to change it to this edition for Chuang, and the note is to make a splash.
